asset.prompt: A cinematic, hyper-detailed, slightly unsettling upper-body character portrait of Patty, looking annoyed. She is wearing a simple 90s-style t-shirt. The scene is illuminated by harsh, direct lighting, creating a tense atmosphere. The overall style emphasizes detailed textures and a slightly distorted, wide-angle perspective.
